allow_user_to_change_password.description: Whether IAM users are allowed to change their own passwords.

maximum_consecutive_identical_chars.description: The maximum number of consecutive identical characters.

maximum_password_length.description: The maximum number of characters that a password can contain.

minimum_password_age.description: The minimum password usage time, in minutes.

minimum_password_length.description: The minimum number of characters that a password must contain.

password_char_combination.description: The minimum number of character types that a password must contain.

password_not_username_or_invert.description: Whether the password can be the username or the username spelled backwards.

password_requirements.description: The requirements of character that passwords must include.

password_reuse_prevention.description: The password cannot be repeated with historical for a certain number of times.

password_validity_period.description: The password validity period, in days.
